# One Mind (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 149

This spell functions like *[[One Mind, Lesser (Spell)|lesser one mind]],* except as noted here, and in addition it allows you and your special mount to predict each otherâ€™s movements, giving you a significant edge in combat. You and your mount both gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls as long as you are mounted.
